allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Deploy complete Cakir Facades website

- Full React SPA with Vite build
- All pages with PageHero backgrounds
- Performance optimized \(CSS animations, no framer-motion\)
- Mobile responsive design
- SEO optimized with structured data

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix PageHero image paths for all pages

- Fixed incorrect image paths in PageHero components
- Realisations: projet-01-ravalement-immeuble-pierre
- Blog: projet-10-cloture-palmiye-desen
- FAQ: projet-12-neuf-beige
- Contact: projet-05-cloture-beige-jardin
- DevisGratuit: projet-15-maison-pierre-fenetre

All pages tested and verified working

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
